name: WooCommerce Advanced SKU Reports
author: Websavers Inc.

sections.description:
This plugin adds a new report under the WooCommerce Stock tab that provides inventory reports and allows
SKU sorting.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to WooCommerce > Reports > Stock > All stock by SKU
  4. Sort by whichever column you like
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to WooCommerce > Reports > Stock > All stock by SKU
  4. Sort by whichever column you like

Can I export to CSV?

Not yet. But with enough demand we’ll consider adding it.

short_description: This plugin enables inventory reports sorted by SKU
description:
This plugin adds a new report under the WooCommerce Stock tab that provides inventory reports and allows
SKU sorting.
